title: Google\Cloud\Debugger\CliDaemon
name: CliDaemon
description: This class handles command line options and starts a configured Debugger Daemon.

params.name: options.config
params.description: Path to a configuration file that should return a Daemon instance.

params.name: options.sourceRoot
params.description: Path to the source root. Ignored if $config is set.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Start the Daemon. This is expected to run indefinitely.
